response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is substantial as well. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its value to both of us and ensures a satisfactory transaction for all parties involved. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
